thread.title: Niall Horan soaked at show; fans outraged
thread.title_full: Niall Horan soaked at show; fans outraged | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Niall Horan soaked at show; fans outraged
text:
Note to One Direction fans: Throwing water on someone is not a sign of affection. That's the message other fans are trying to get across to someone who soaked band member Niall Horan while he was playing electric guitar at the group's Belfast, Ireland, show Thursday. The incident took place during a performance of "Little White Lies." Once fans saw a video of what happened, they took their outrage to Twitter where the hashtag "#CanYouRespectNiall" trended almost immediately. Fan tweets ranged from infuriated to terrified.
Cee Lo engaged
Wedding bells will soon be ringing for Cee Lo Green. After several years of dating girlfriend Shani James, the Grammy-winning singer officially announced the couple's engagement Thursday, adding that he proposed nearly a year ago. "It was just a typical night at the studio, but then again, not so typical cause I did something extra special, out of the ordinary," Green told People. "I went and purchased a ring that we had seen together, maybe four or five months or so prior. I went back and purchased the ring and I just kind of had it stashed away in some old equipment. And I said, 'Will you reach in there and grab something for me?' "
Are you happy Kelly Clarkson is having a boy? Go to
hollywoodlife.com and let us know.
